channel.title: My VB rendition of noughts and crosses
channel.description:
As part of a school project i made my own rendition of X's and O's
downlod here [url=http://rapidshare.de/files/37186504/X_and_O_s.exe.html]http://rapidshare.de/files/37186504/X_and_O_s.exe.html[/url]
I'd like to see what you think and how i can improve it

item.title: My VB rendition of noughts and crosses
item.dc:creator: @sup000 sup000
item.description:
@sup000 wrote:

looks ok.

If player 1/2 wins the game, the other player can still also ‘win’ by completing any other possible ‘3 in a row’ combination, on a already won game, i.e. Player 1 and Paler 2 can both take points from one game. Maybe reset the paying grid once ok has been pushed, when the winner is first displayed?

thats about all i got from the 2 games i played

Read full topic
item.source: My VB rendition of noughts and crosses
